messages.message: Letting Gwen speak and go first here but I would have a customer in mind @avi if you‘re looking for one. Swiss Re want to evaluate a combination of apps, converse and chatbots shortly. For them it might be helpful to use chatbots via API.
@fernando.piazza.ctr can add more context here but we are looking at the capability to speak with multiple previous specified documents via API with a Brazilian partner

@Balaram I think we can achieve this using multi-doc Converse API today also? We can fetch the doc ids and then make a streaming query? Disclaimer: currently integrating with the streaming endpoint can be challenging
I’ve tried out the API and you can send multiple docs into it, but as I understand the full multi doc api isn’t support yet
I sent 10 files into 3.5 and it couldn’t process them all

@Gwen We don't support multiple docs with Converse ask-prompt APIs. To interact with Chatbot, @avi the above mentioned approach works but that requires some work.

@joshbronko has used streaming API before. He can share the code.

@Balaram It seems like the API allows you to send multiple docs in :woman-shrugging::skin-tone-2:

line 3 says ‘one doc per api call’ but I could send 4 before it got upset
@avi please let me know the right way to do this!

@Gwen it was initially designed to support multiple documents. But with streaming API in place, this got deprioritised.

Can you please let me know what usecase we are solving here and what is the urgency? I can hop in over a call and help

Connected with Gwen and here is the summary:

1. Gwen want to showcase the multi-doc capability using APIs. Currently multi-doc API is not supported, so asked Gwen to use streaming API
2. Gwen to connect with Josh on steps to consume streaming API doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jDQZu6Vo4swTYIuvxBulQNdEHTRO0F-k6wq48r766Lw/edit)
Let’s create an initiative for this. We should consider this in Q2 roadmap planning. @avi
We already have one - [EPD-1280] Query Chatbots using an API - Jira (atlassian.net) (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1280)
We need one for converse app too
